trans-unit.source: Specifies that a SAML assertion is addressed to a particular audience.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que uma asserção SAML destina-se a um público específico.

trans-unit.source: The SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition class corresponds to the `<saml:AudienceRestrictionCondition>` XML element, which is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: A classe SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition que corresponde do `<saml:AudienceRestrictionCondition>` elemento XML, que é definido na especificação do OASIS SAML 1.1.

trans-unit.source: The SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition is one of several <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions> that can be used to scope a SAML assertion Use the SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition class to specify a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> is intended for a specific audience and that the issuing SAML authority does not warrant the SAML assertion for other audiences that receive the security token.
trans-unit.target: O SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition é uma das várias <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>que pode ser usado para definir o escopo de uma asserção de SAML, Use a classe SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition para especificar um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>é pretendido para um público específico e que a autoridade emissora de SAML não garante a asserção SAML para outros públicos que recebem o token de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>

trans-unit.source: The claims for <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens are expressed as part of a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>, which can optionally have a set of conditions affect the validity of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: As declarações para <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>tokens de segurança são expressos como parte de um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>, opcionalmente, que pode ter um conjunto de condições afetam a validade da asserção.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: One of those conditions is a SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition, which specifies that the assertion is addressed to one or more specific audiences.
trans-unit.target: Uma dessas condições é um SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition, que especifica se a asserção destina-se para uma ou mais audiências específicas.

trans-unit.source: The issuing SAML authority cannot prevent an unintended recipient from taking action on the basis of the information provided in the SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: A autoridade emissora de SAML não pode impedir que um destinatário indesejado agir com base nas informações fornecidas na asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: However, the SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition class allows the SAML authority to state explicitly that no warranty is provided to such a party in a machine- and human-readable form.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a classe SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition permite que a autoridade SAML para declarar explicitamente que nenhuma garantia é fornecida para uma parte de forma máquina - e legível.

trans-unit.source: To specify the set of intended audiences, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29> constructor that accepts a set of audiences.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar o conjunto de públicos-alvo, use o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29>construtor que aceita um conjunto de públicos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29>

trans-unit.source: To get the set of intended audiences, access the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o conjunto de públicos-alvo, acessar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref> class with the specified set of audiences a SAML assertion is intended for.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"> </xref> classe com o conjunto especificado de uma asserção SAML destina-se para o público.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.Uri> that contain a set of intended audiences.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> do tipo <xref:System.Uri>que contêm um conjunto de públicos-alvo.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: audiences is .
trans-unit.target: audiencesis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of audiences a SAML assertion is intended for.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conjunto de uma asserção SAML destina-se para o público.

trans-unit.source: To set the Audiences property, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29> constructor that accepts a set of audiences.
trans-unit.target: Para definir a propriedade públicos, use o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29>construtor que aceita um conjunto de públicos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref:System.Uri> that contain a set of intended audiences.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> do tipo <xref:System.Uri>que contêm um conjunto de públicos-alvo.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as propriedades desta instância são somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar essa instância do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>chamada de classe somente leitura, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.MakeReadOnly%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as propriedades desta instância são somente leitura; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que essa instância para ser somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o método MakeReadOnly é chamado, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.IsReadOnly%2A>está definida como `true`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref> element from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""> </xref> elemento do leitor de XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>para ler o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""> </xref> elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> que é capaz de ler os elementos XML na asserção SAML que são definidos na especificação de SAML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: -or- samlSerializer is .

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref> element has a child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Audience>" name="<Audience>" href=""></xref> element does not have a value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""> </xref> elemento tem um filho <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Audience>" name="<Audience>" href=""> </xref> elemento não tem um valor.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref> element into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: Grava o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""> </xref> elemento para o serializador XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>para gravar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""> </xref> elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in the SAML assertion that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> que é capaz de gravar elementos XML na asserção SAML que é definida na especificação de SAML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que é capaz de gravar <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusulas.
